request: Sure, what do you need help with?

changetimeapprover.main: Please reach out to your local office HR admin to update the time approver in your Vantage Employee Human Resource(HR) Record using **PA30** transaction.
changetimeapprover.sub:
You can find more information about the SAP transactions to be used in the below links from the IPG Learning Center. 

 --- 

 *For more details please click the link(s) below*

[Maintain new time approver in **ZHR04**](https://learningcenter.interpublic.com/gm/folder-1.11.5775?mode=EU&primaryCSH=zhr04)

 [Update Time Approver in **PA30**](https://learningcenter.interpublic.com/gm/folder-1.11.584767?mode=EU&primaryCSH=pa30)

removetimeapprover.main: Please request your HR to remove you as the time approver.
removetimeapprover.sub:
They will need to update the Vantage  **PA30** record using the below steps. For more information, visit the IPG Learning Center. 

 --- 

 *For more details please click the link(s) below*

setuptimeapprover.main: Please request your HR to add you as the time approver.
setuptimeapprover.sub:
They will need to update the Vantage  **PA30** record using the below steps. For more information, visit the IPG Learning Center. 

 ---

updatetimeapprover.main: Please contact a Time Super user who will be able to edit time on your behalf up to 6 months in the past, or can un-approve your time entries and allow you to edit them up to 3 months in the past.
updatetimeapprover.sub:
You can learn more about updating time entries at the IPG Learning Center.
